sentence.text: The student's t-test was used to compare negative regulation of B cell apoptotic process expression in the tumour and the adjacent normal tissues.

entity.text: negative regulation of B cell apoptotic process

sentence.text: There was a significantly higher expression level of negative regulation of B cell apoptotic process in the tumour than in the adjacent normal tissue (0.0052 ± 0.0021 vs 0.0027 ± 0.0018, P AAAA 0.001).

entity.text: negative regulation of B cell apoptotic process

sentence.text: Patients with genotype AA were found to have remarkably higher negative regulation of B cell apoptotic process expression in the tumour than those with genotype CC (P = 0.01).

entity.text: negative regulation of B cell apoptotic process
